en: So remain on a right course
So remain on a right course

ar: وَلَا تَتَّبِعَآنِّ سَبِيلَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
en: and follow not the way of those who do not know."
And We took the Children of Israel across the sea,
and Pharaoh and his soldiers pursued them in tyranny and enmity
he said, "I believe that there is no deity

ar: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِىٓ ءَامَنَتْ بِهِۦ بَنُوٓا إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
en: except that in whom the Children of Israel believe,
and I am of the Muslims."
